div.p:
Join Apple's Service Management team as an Engineering Manager and inspire the team for engineering excellence of multiple highly scalable, fault tolerant, business critical, global applications. The group is looking for a motivated and detail-oriented engineering lead, who will be responsible for architecting, developing and running Apple’s Worldwide Service business .Opportunity to revolutionize the service business with emerging concepts like machine learning/predictive analytics. Candidate should motivate and manage high performing engineering resources across multiple products. The candidate’s skill will be a strong blend between Engineering expertise and aptitude towards solving complex business problems .
Key Responsibilities: • Architecting and developing secure web applications and services using Java, Spring and JAX-* • Groom and build a strong engineering team for Service management applications • Analyzing use cases and requirements to design secure and scalable web applications • Collaborating with front-end engineers / shared services team to orchestrate/develop REST APIs for scalable user-friendly interfaces • Collaborating with data pipeline engineers to build integrations with big data technologies • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and implement complex enterprise solutions
BS degree in computer science or equivalent field plus 12+ years software development experience or MS degree plus 8-10+ years software development experience, or equivalent
